title: Mobile-Supported Elementary Mathematics Project-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and primary education experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment focusing on math problem-solving projects using mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can complete real-life math problem-solving projects using mobile apps and digital tools with 80% or higher completion quality
Learners can iteratively improve math problem-solving processes through peer and self-assessment at least three times
Learners can analyze learning effectiveness based on data collected in technology-integrated learning environments and write a two-page reflective report
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
